00030 /**
00031  * Registry class for accessing variables globally.
00032  *
00033  * @category   Colony
00034  * @package    Bee
00035  * @copyright  Copyright (c) Army of Bees (www.armyofbees.com)
00036  * @license    http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php MIT License
00037  */
00038 class Bee_Registry
00039 {
00040     /**
00041      * Singleton instance of registry
00042      * @var Bee_Registry
00043      */
00044     private static $instance;
00045 
00046     /**
00047      * Stored variables in registry
00048      * @var array
00049      */
00050     private $vars = array();
00051     
00052     /**
00053      * Stores a variable in the registry
00054      * 
00055      * @param string $key Key of the variable
00056      * @param mixed $var Reference to the variable
00057      * @return void
00058      */
00059     public function setVar( $key, $var )
00060     {
00061         $this->vars[$key] = null;
00062         $this->vars[$key] &= $var;
00063     }
00064     
00065     /**
00066      * Gets a variable from the registry
00067      * 
00068      * @param string $key Key of the variable
00069      * @return mixed
00070      */
00071     public function &getVar( $key )
00072     {
00073         return $this->vars[$key];
00074     }
00075     
00076     /**
00077      * Gets the singleton instance of the registry
00078      * 
00079      * @return Bee_Registry
00080      */   
00081     public static function &getInstance() 
00082     {
00083         if( !isset( self::$instance ) )
00084             self::$instance = new Bee_Registry;
00085 
00086         return self::$instance;
00087     }
00088 }
00089  
00090 /**
00091  * Public function for convienience. Wraps around Bee_Registry::getVar()
00092  * 
00093  * @param string $key Key of the variable
00094  * @return mixed
00095  */
00096 function &Bee_Registry( $key )
00097 {
00098     $reg =& Bee_Registry::getInstance();
00099 
00100     return $reg->getVar( $key );
00101 }
